hero.title: Empowering Agriculture from Soil to Sale on {appName}
hero.subtitle: The single platform connecting every actor in the agricultural value chain for a more transparent, efficient, and sustainable future.

features.title: Key Features of DamDoh
features.subtitle: Everything you need to grow, connect, and trade, all in one place.

networking.title: Intelligent Networking
networking.description: AI-powered connection suggestions to link you with the right partners, from input suppliers to international buyers.

marketplace.title: Direct Marketplace
marketplace.description: Buy and sell produce and services directly, increasing transparency and profitability for all stakeholders.

forums.title: Topical Forums
forums.description: Share knowledge, discuss challenges, and collaborate on solutions within focused topic forums.

talent.title: Talent Exchange
talent.description: Offer or find specialized agricultural services, from on-demand harvesting to drone surveying.

forWho.title: One Platform for the Entire Value Chain
forWho.description: DamDoh is uniquely designed to serve the entire agricultural ecosystem, creating a single source of truth and opportunity for all.

farmers.title: Farmers
farmers.description: Access better markets, find quality inputs, and get expert advice to increase yield and profitability.

buyers.title: Buyers & Processors
buyers.description: Source traceable, high-quality produce directly from growers and cooperatives, ensuring supply chain reliability.

experts.title: Experts & Service Providers
experts.description: Offer your specialized skills and services to a broad agricultural audience seeking your expertise.

fis.title: Financial Institutions
fis.description: Offer loans, insurance, and financial products to a verified agricultural community.

forWho.imageAlt: A diverse group of agricultural stakeholders collaborating

cta.title: Join the Agricultural Revolution
cta.subtitle: Sign up today and be part of a growing global network dedicated to transforming the future of food.

AppFooter.tagline: Connecting the entire agricultural value chain.

forumsPage.title: Forums
forumsPage.description: Connect with others, share knowledge, and stay up-to-date on the latest conversations.

pinning.pinnedDescription: The forums page is now your default homepage.
pinning.unpinnedDescription: Your homepage has been reset to default.

noTopics.title: No Topics Yet
noTopics.description: Be the first to create a forum topic!

noTopicsFound.title: No Topics Found
noTopicsFound.description: Try adjusting your search filters or check back later.

errors.loadDescription: Impossible de charger les sujets du forum pour le moment.

loadSuggestions.title: Erreur de chargement des suggestions
loadSuggestions.description: Impossible de récupérer les suggestions de sujets.

mobileMenu.description: A mobile menu with navigation links.

logOut.title: Logged Out
logOut.description: You have been successfully logged out.
logOut.failDescription: Could not log out. Please try again.
